com.kme.kaltura.kmesdk.webrtc.peerconnection

Interface IKmePeerConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KmePeerConnectionImpl

    public IKmePeerConnection

    An interface for actions under WebRTC peer connection object

                          boolean isPublisher,
                          java.util.List<org.webrtc.PeerConnection.IceServer> iceServers)

        Creates peer connection

        Parameters:
        context - application context
        localVideoSink - local video sink
        remoteVideoSink - remote video sink
        videoCapturer - video capturer
        isPublisher - indicates type of connection
        iceServers - collection of ice servers
